page.title: 09SCHOOL LIFE TODAY
page.content: Today most children start school at{4 {years old}but when Granny was a little girl she went to school at{the age of {6.}Most of the children then walked to school in their{bare feet}because their parents had not enough money to buy them shoes. Today we have {cars,buses,taxies}or{bicycles}to take us.When Granny was going to school the children were taught{English,Irish, {Reading,Writing,Mathematics,History, {Geography,Sewing & Cookery,}similar to todays subjects. Nowadays at the end of the Primary School career there is an examination called{the Eleven Plus. As a result of the grades obtained in this test a pupil is selected for an academic education in a {Grammar {School}or for a more practical education at a {High School.
